attributes.action: Make it a Criminal offence for MP's to lie to or mislead the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The trust between government and the general public has to be renewed.  
By making it a criminal act to lie in, too or for parliament would help redress this. We are all aware that sometimes issues come under the umbrella of national security and they should remain so but telling us black is the new white will not be accepted anymore.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
